Hi,

Is there a way to dynamically add tests to a test suite in JUnit 4?

M=
aybe I am misunderstanding something, but it seems like the only way
to add=
 tests is via the @...{} annotation.

In JUnit 3 I could do =
something like this

public static Test suite() {
    TestSuite suite =3D n=
ew TestSuite();
    for (int i =3D 0; i < 100; i++) {
        suite.addTest=
(new MyTestCase(i));
    }
    return suite;
}


--- PM
